---

## Summary
Reminders system with snooze, notifications, and avatar animations.

## Requirements
- SQLite-based reminders.
- Notifications cross-platform.
- Snooze 5/10/30 min.
- Alarm sounds with defaults.
- Avatar animates alerts.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Reminders fire at correct time.
- Snooze reschedules reminders.
- Alarm sounds play across OSes.

## Dependencies
- FR-003 HUD
- FR-007 MCP Core
